ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] New Necromancer
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a Gnome Necro, and so far the only places I have been KOS by the guards and merchants have been HighHold Pass and Rivervale.  Of course every so often
ygData.messageBody:
I have a Gnome Necro, and so far the only places I have been KOS by the
guards and merchants have been HighHold Pass and Rivervale. Of course every
so often is a city I run into druid types (driuds rangers and stuff) that
attack me. But I just avoid em.



>From: "Qaelan" <qaelan@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
>To: <eq_necromancer@egroups.com>
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] New Necromancer
>Date: Wed, 3 May 2000 23:29:51 +1000
>
>hi everyone, i wasa thinking of starting a human necromancer, but was not
>sure where the guards would kill me
>
>I understand i will not be killed in my home town, how about any other
>town? i would really like to see the dark elf city and the other continent
>(faydwer i think it is) some day too. Will i ever be able to go there? As,
>will i ever be able to go to the high man city or not?
>
>Thanks for your help
